item.description:
It's time for another trip. How about checking out Chicago at the best time of the year-summer. I was thinking of leaving on Thursday, July 1 and return on Thursday, July 8.

Some events that are happening in the city at the time include: Taste of Chicago, Summer Dance, free concerts at Grant Park, take a river and walking tour with the Chicago Architure Foundation, July 4th fireworks, stroll in Bucktown/Wicker Park (an artist colony and foodie neighborhood). It looks like a lively city.

I have never been to Chicago so it will be an adventure for me.

FYI: my travel dates can be flexible.

group.name: Old and Not so Old Ladies Travel

item.name: The Windy City- summer time in Chicago
